infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow you to take and save pictures associated with the Holy Sites. These images are only stored locally and never sent to an external server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to allow you to save pictures associated with the Holy Sites. These images are only stored locally and never sent to an external server.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio notes associated with the Holy Sites. This audio is only stored locally and never sent to an external server.
